I am a Stone, a timeless piece of the Earth's crust.
For thousands, perhaps millions of years, I have rested
under the sun and stars, witnessing the dance of the
seasons and the passage of time.
And BTW the chest is not around me!
OK! My name is stone as well!
I am bigger than other! And I have nice body!
My body, though seemingly inert, tells a story of ancient
geological processes: the fiery heart of volcanoes, the
immense pressure of tectonic shifts, or the gentle caress
of running water shaping me over eons.
And BTW the chest is not around me!
